'''Druid of Winter''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|You find four godlike druids waiting for you in the clearing. The death and moon godlike whisper to one another, their gazes occasionally falling on you. The nature godlike sways slightly on her feet, her eyes half-closed, while the fire godlike balls his fists at his sides and grits his teeth.}}

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =[Hunting Season](/huntingSeason/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Hunting Season](/huntingSeason/): He is one of the druids leading the attacks on [Sayuka](/sayuka/).
